title: Available for Trade:  T206 Zach Wheat Rookie SGC 45 (Piedmont)
author: MailboxBaseball

posts.post_title: Available for Trade:  T206 Zach Wheat Rookie SGC 45 (Piedmont)
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade for anything you have available that adds up to $400

I accept all sports and non-sport, preferably pre-1983 (with some obvious exceptions - Jordan rookies, Jeter foils, 93 finest refractors, etc).

Its a chance for you to reduce the size of your collection while obtaining a quality card.

For simplicity, please offer graded cards that have a value of at least $35 per card.

Autographed items also accepted. 

I have done many successful net54 deals recently with the most popular sellers.

Any questions please ask.

Thanks

Price drop  

Now asking for $400 worth of cards

Thanks
